title: Marriage and Video Games
itunes:author: Guests: Bill and Pam Farrel
itunes:summary:
While some video games aren't necessarily bad, if they prevent you from communicating with your spouse, they can do great harm to your marriage. John, Erin and Greg provide some hope to those with a spouse who's addicted to playing video games. Featuring Bill and Pam Farrel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive Bill and Pam Farrel's book "The First Five Years: Make the Love Investment That Lasts a Lifetime " for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1430605

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/marriage-and-video-games/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/thriving-in-the-early-years-of-marriage-digital-product?refcd=1430605

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
